mapper.sql: POWER_EXPRESSION_ID, TABLE_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DATE, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME, DELETE_STATUS, REMARK, STATUS, TITLE
mapper.select:
select pe.*, r.role_title as rpr_ROLE_TITLE,r.role_id as rpr_ROLE_ID,r.role_id as rpr_ID, a.acct_title as apr_ACCT_TITLE,a.acct_id as apr_ACCT_ID,a.acct_id as apr_ID, o.id as opr_ORG_ID,o.org_name as opr_ORG_NAME,o.id as opr_ID,
accpc.id as ac_id, accpc.TABLE_NAME as ac_TABLE_NAME, accpc.EXPRESSION as ac_EXPRESSION, accpc.EXPRESSION_TYPE as ac_EXPRESSION_TYPE, accpc.FIELD_ID as ac_FIELD_ID, accpc.FIELD_VALUE as ac_FIELD_VALUE, accpc.POWER_EXPRESSION_ID as ac_POWER_EXPRESSION_ID, acctm.FIELD_NAME as ac_FIELD_NAME, acctm.FIELD_type as ac_FIELD_type,
rolepc.id as rc_id, rolepc.TABLE_NAME as rc_TABLE_NAME, rolepc.EXPRESSION as rc_EXPRESSION, rolepc.EXPRESSION_TYPE as rc_EXPRESSION_TYPE, rolepc.FIELD_ID as rc_FIELD_ID, rolepc.FIELD_VALUE as rc_FIELD_VALUE, rolepc.POWER_EXPRESSION_ID as rc_POWER_EXPRESSION_ID, rprm.FIELD_NAME as rc_FIELD_NAME, rprm.FIELD_type as rc_FIELD_type,
orgpc.id as oc_id, orgpc.TABLE_NAME as oc_TABLE_NAME, orgpc.EXPRESSION as oc_EXPRESSION, orgpc.EXPRESSION_TYPE as oc_EXPRESSION_TYPE, orgpc.FIELD_ID as oc_FIELD_ID, orgpc.FIELD_VALUE as oc_FIELD_VALUE, orgpc.POWER_EXPRESSION_ID as oc_POWER_EXPRESSION_ID, orgm.FIELD_NAME as oc_FIELD_NAME, orgm.FIELD_type as oc_FIELD_type
from power_expression pe LEFT JOIN ROLE_PRIV_RELATION rpr ON rpr.POWER_EXPRESSION_id = pe.POWER_EXPRESSION_id LEFT JOIN PRIV_CONDITION_CONFIG rolepc ON rolepc.id = rpr.RELATION_ID LEFT JOIN METADATA_FIELD rprm on rprm.FIELD_ID=rolepc.FIELD_ID LEFT JOIN role_info r on r.role_id=rpr.role_id LEFT JOIN ORG_PRIV_RELATION opr ON opr.POWER_EXPRESSION_id = pe.POWER_EXPRESSION_id LEFT JOIN PRIV_CONDITION_CONFIG orgpc ON orgpc.id = opr.RELATION_ID LEFT JOIN METADATA_FIELD orgm on orgm.FIELD_ID=orgpc.FIELD_ID LEFT JOIN org_info o on o.id=opr.org_id LEFT JOIN ACCOUNT_PRIV_RELATION apr ON apr.POWER_EXPRESSION_id = pe.POWER_EXPRESSION_id LEFT JOIN PRIV_CONDITION_CONFIG accpc ON accpc.id = apr.RELATION_ID LEFT JOIN acct_info a on a.acct_id=apr.acct_id LEFT JOIN METADATA_FIELD acctm on acctm.FIELD_ID=accpc.FIELD_ID where
pe.POWER_EXPRESSION_ID = #{powerExpressionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select pe.*, rolepc.id as rc_id, rolepc.TABLE_NAME as rc_TABLE_NAME, rolepc.EXPRESSION as rc_EXPRESSION, rolepc.EXPRESSION_TYPE as rc_EXPRESSION_TYPE, rolepc.FIELD_ID as rc_FIELD_ID, rolepc.FIELD_VALUE as rc_FIELD_VALUE, rolepc.POWER_EXPRESSION_ID as rc_POWER_EXPRESSION_ID, rolem.FIELD_NAME as rc_fieldName
from power_expression pe LEFT JOIN ROLE_PRIV_RELATION rpr ON rpr.POWER_EXPRESSION_id = pe.POWER_EXPRESSION_id LEFT JOIN PRIV_CONDITION_CONFIG rolepc ON rolepc.id = rpr.RELATION_ID LEFT JOIN role_info r on r.role_id=rpr.role_id and r.role_id in (select arr.role_id from acct_role_real arr where arr.acct_id=#{acctId,jdbcType=BIGINT}) LEFT JOIN METADATA_FIELD rolem on rolem.FIELD_ID=rolepc.FIELD_ID where 1=1 and r.ROLE_ID is not null union all select pe.*, orgpc.id as oc_id, orgpc.TABLE_NAME as oc_TABLE_NAME, orgpc.EXPRESSION as oc_EXPRESSION, orgpc.EXPRESSION_TYPE as oc_EXPRESSION_TYPE, orgpc.FIELD_ID as oc_FIELD_ID, orgpc.FIELD_VALUE as oc_FIELD_VALUE, orgpc.POWER_EXPRESSION_ID as oc_POWER_EXPRESSION_ID, orgm.FIELD_NAME as oc_fieldName from power_expression pe LEFT JOIN ORG_PRIV_RELATION opr ON opr.POWER_EXPRESSION_id = pe.POWER_EXPRESSION_id LEFT JOIN PRIV_CONDITION_CONFIG orgpc ON orgpc.id = opr.RELATION_ID LEFT JOIN org_info o on o.id=opr.org_id and o.id in (select acct.O_INFO_ID from acct_info acct where acct.acct_id=#{acctId,jdbcType=BIGINT}) LEFT JOIN METADATA_FIELD orgm on orgm.FIELD_ID=orgpc.FIELD_ID where 1=1 and o.id is not null union all select pe.*, accpc.id as ac_id, accpc.TABLE_NAME as ac_TABLE_NAME, accpc.EXPRESSION as ac_EXPRESSION, accpc.EXPRESSION_TYPE as ac_EXPRESSION_TYPE, accpc.FIELD_ID as ac_FIELD_ID, accpc.FIELD_VALUE as ac_FIELD_VALUE, accpc.POWER_EXPRESSION_ID as ac_POWER_EXPRESSION_ID, acctm.FIELD_NAME as ac_fieldName from power_expression pe LEFT JOIN ORG_PRIV_RELATION opr ON opr.POWER_EXPRESSION_id = pe.POWER_EXPRESSION_id LEFT JOIN PRIV_CONDITION_CONFIG orgpc ON orgpc.id = opr.RELATION_ID LEFT JOIN org_info o on o.id=opr.org_id and o.id in (select acct.O_INFO_ID from acct_info acct where acct.acct_id=114) LEFT JOIN METADATA_FIELD orgm on orgm.FIELD_ID=orgpc.FIELD_ID LEFT JOIN ACCOUNT_PRIV_RELATION apr ON apr.POWER_EXPRESSION_id = pe.POWER_EXPRESSION_id LEFT JOIN PRIV_CONDITION_CONFIG accpc ON accpc.id = apr.RELATION_ID LEFT JOIN acct_info a on a.acct_id=apr.acct_id and a.acct_id=#{acctId,jdbcType=BIGINT} LEFT JOIN METADATA_FIELD acctm on acctm.FIELD_ID=accpc.FIELD_ID where 1=1 and a.ACCT_ID is not null
mapper.insert: insert into power_expression (POWER_EXPRESSION_ID, TABLE_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DATE, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME, DELETE_STATUS, REMARK, STATUS, TITLE, ORG_ID) values (#{powerExpressionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tableId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleteStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update power_expression
TABLE_ID = #{tableId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED_TIME = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DELETE_STATUS = #{deleteStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where POWER_EXPRESSION_ID = #{powerExpressionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update power_expression set TABLE_ID = #{tableId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_TIME = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DELETE_STATUS = #{deleteStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where POWER_EXPRESSION_ID = #{powerExpressionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update power_expression set TABLE_ID = #{tableId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_TIME = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DELETE_STATUS = #{deleteStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where POWER_EXPRESSION_ID = #{powerExpressionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
